about: I'm a person, who is not afraid of challenges. After finishing Bachelor Degree, I decided to change departments of studies completely to broaden my horizons, but still studied in English language. Also, I decided to seek better career opportunities and took on promotion in Wrocław and at the same time I was finishing studies in Szczecin. During my maternity leave I decided to start learning about programming. Using all available sources like books, videos, blogs and free courses I started learning JavaScript, HTML and CSS. Next I introduced React. Recently, I started to use Github and Git. The next challenge on my list is to start learning TypeScript.
hobbies: reading books, especially mystery, thriller, memoir, biography, guide and non-fictions ones
watching Football, I'm a Manchester United fan
playing video games, especially sandbox ones

studies.department: Faculty of Economics, Finance and Management
